name: I am Tree
description:
This is a game made for Ludum Dare 41 with the theme of "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres." This is my take, a calm, relaxing nature builder action game where you play as a tree. Defend yourself against lumberjacks and woodpeckers as you collect rain to grow your tree and gain more health. The goal is to live as long as possible.

Controls:

Build - Right Click

Throw Apple - Space
